title: Tortilla Espanola (Spanish Tortilla)
ingredients: ['125ml (4 fl oz) olive oil', '900g (2 lb) baking potatoes, peeled and cut into 5mm slices', 'salt and pepper to taste', '2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 onions, sliced into rings', '6 eggs', '1 roasted red pepper, cut into strips', '75g (3 oz) serrano ham, chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh Italian parsley']
